channel.title: Menus on The Radnor Arms
channel.description: Recent content in Menus on The Radnor Arms

item.title: Weekday Takeaway
item.description: Weekday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is only from 5.30pm - 7.30pm Burgers & Sausages Bacon Double Cheese Burger £7.00 Beef Burger £3.00 Cheese Burger £3.50 Southern Chicken Burger £5.00 Southern Chicken Bacon/Cheese Burger £7.00 Spicy Bean Burger(vg) £6.00 From the Sea Please note that fish may contain bones.

item.title: Sunday Takeaway
item.description: Sunday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is from 12pm - 2.30pm (orders must be made by 2pm Saturday) Roasts Half Roast Chicken (on the bone) £12.00 Roast Beef £13.00 Roast Lamb £13.50 Pumpkin, Mushroom & Chestnut Roast (v/gf) £10.50 Mushroom, Brie,Hazelnut & Cranberry Wellington £13.50 All Sunday Roasts come with roast potatoes, roast parsnips, homemade Yorkshire Pudding, sage & onion stuffing, cauliflower cheese, and a selection of vegetables.
